description.translate: Already it came and for the second time gave birth to an endless day.

items.nbt: {display:{Name:"\"§6L'ultime aube\"","Lore":["{\"text\":\"§7Jà elle vint et pour la seconde fois\"}","{\"text\":\"§7elle enfanta un jour sans fin.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7Already it came and for the second time\"}","{\"text\":\"§7gave birth to an endless day.\"}","{\"text\":\"§7STR§a3 §7LUC§a1 §7HUN§a1\"}"]}}
